nodes.bodyText: Are you saying there is a retry of getRemoteServiceVersion outside of this, so we don't need to use retryRPC? I don't understand where the infinite loop is happening.

When a channel creation succeeds but getRemoteServiceVersion() fails always.
In that case, retryRpcInternal will call disconnect after the rpc, then connect again. After disconnect, connect will call getRemoteServiceVersion() again.

This will create connect -> getRemoteServiceVersion -> connect -> getRemoteServiceVersion loop.
connect after getRemoveServiceVersion being the second attempts.
I see. Then, could you add a comment here saying we don't need to retry here, since the the entire connection/channel will be retried outside?
